item.description:
Hi All,

I am scheduling a meetup for the group to get together for Happy Hour. This one will be at the Chowder Pot In Branford. I am starting it at 5 pm for the half price Appetizers. After that, we will see Obama get inaugerated into office on their TV's. They also have Karaoke starting at 8:30 till 12 am if you are also interested in that. this should be good night because of the things going on that night. There will also be a lot of things to talk about because of the happenings that night, so come on down and join the party.

I am starting it early, because of the 1/2 price appetizers to take advantage of, but I expect people to meet and mingle 'till like 10 or so because of the Karaoke. So, If you can't make it at 5, that's ok, we'll be there until later.

I hope to see new members to also come on down. The nominal fee of 2 bucks will go towards the Meetup/PartyExpress Raffle for the FREE ENTRANCE FEE COUPON !!

Time to Party again, so join us !!

Steve C.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Chowder Pot Happy Hour and Karaoke Show.
